snippet.title: Arriving: Tacoma, now with over 2 hours of Developer Commentary
snippet.description:
Tacoma is coming to PlayStation 4! https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP3575-CUSA11366_00-TACOMA0000000451 And along with it, we're adding Developer Commentary Mode: over two hours of audio commentary from the designers, storytellers, animators, artists and programmers behind this one-of-a-kind experience. Commentary will be coming to PC and Xbox as well when Tacoma launches on PS4 on May 8!

Get ready to experience the story that reviewers have called "Enthralling" (Game Informer) "gripping and emotional" (Destructoid) on PS4-- and learn all the behind-the-scenes secrets as you play, straight from the creators at Fullbright.
